name: Crazy Mini Golf 2
description:
Fun and excitement for all the family.

Features

• Intuitive and incredibly easy pick-up-and-play control design that brings the game to life like never before for both casual and more advanced players.
• Special focus on the competitive Multi-Player experience. Play with up to 4 friends or family.
• Single-Player Tournament Mode – Hone your skills in the single player challenge.
• 72 larger-than-life holes with bright colorful interactive levels.
• Compatible with the Wii MotionPlus accessory.
• Four exciting new courses including Funfair, Ice Age, Halloween and Egyptian Pyramids.
• Create and customize your own unique golfing character with the amazing NuYu editor.
